title: Adverb collection 1
sentences: I often drink coffee in the afternoon.
Are you coming to our meeting today?
We have finished almost all tasks.
Are you coming over to my place tomorrow?
I am very satisfied with the result.
Perhaps it will rain in the evening.
habe ich keine Zeit für ein Telefonat.
Unfortunately, I have no time for a phone call.
We will see each other again soon.
Are you already finished with work?
I am in the office now.
Yesterday the weather was much better.
He works especially fast and focused.
We sometimes eat pizza during the lunch break.
Hopefully, everything works out as planned.
It is really cold outside today.
ohne mein Handy aus dem Haus.
I never leave the house without my phone.
That is a fairly difficult task.
We live over there in the yellow house.
I am always on time for my appointments.
Do you like going for walks in the forest?
It is already very dark outside.
We must check the documents first.
Then we can make a decision.
He even speaks four different languages.
dictionary:
oft - often
heute - today
fast - almost
morgen - tomorrow
sehr - very
vielleicht - perhaps / maybe
leider - unfortunately
bald - soon
schon - already
jetzt - now
gestern - yesterday
besonders - especially
manchmal - sometimes
hoffentlich - hopefully
hier - here
wirklich - really
nie - never
ziemlich - fairly / quite
dort - there
immer - always
gerne - gladly / like to
draußen - outside
erst - first / only (time)
dann - then
sogar - even
